snippet.title: Geo Mythica ANNOUNCEMENT Trailer
snippet.description:
Embark on an 8-bit style JRPG quest to save Earth circa 199X. Battle in a distinctive party-based combat system that mixes real-time action and strategic commands. Join Gio and a team of colorful characters as they investigate bizarre global events, uncover long-forgotten legends, and battle mythical foes while unearthing the secrets of Geo Mythica.

Wishlist on Steam! 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1699030/Geo_Mythica/?utm_source=YT
